title:
anyone remember Shield\'s ice cream parlor in the n. 17th shopping center

I believe Frank Powell was manager and he and I went to school together.  I loved Sunday nights when everyone came in after church.   They had me waiting on 14 people and they each left me a quarter back in 1970 I believe
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=5888
